content: slouchy fall leg warmers about these leg warmers i love leg warmers but wanted something baggy that i can wear around my ankles for dance class or with high boots i can never find what i want so i decided to make them myself i made the top wider and the bottom ribbing smaller so they will stay up around the ankle these use one ball of schachenmayer regia strata color sock wool materials 1 skein schachenmayer regia strata color sock wool 100 grams 5 double pointed needles size 3 3mm tapestry needle abbreviations k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl leg warmer make 2 cast on 90 stitches using elastic/long tail cast on join in the round top ribbing work 20 row of k1 p1 ribbing body work 99 row of knit stitches decrease row 1 k7 k2tog repeat until end of row 80 stitches row 2 k6 k2tog repeat until end of row 70 stitches row 3 k5 k2tog repeat until end of row 60 stitches bottom ribbing work 20 row of k1 p1 ribbing finish bind off using an elastic bind off i used the miraculous elastic bind off weave in ends
